2000 NBA Playoffs Summary

1999 Playoffs Summary 2001 Playoffs Summary

League Champion: Los Angeles Lakers

Finals MVP: Shaquille O'Neal (38.0 / 16.7 / 2.3)


2000 Playoff Leaders:

PTS: Shaquille O'Neal (707)

TRB: Shaquille O'Neal (355)

AST: Mark Jackson (178)

WS: Shaquille O'Neal (4.7)
